name: Asteroid Bomber
description:
Made for the 24th Mini Jam. 

Theme: Space

Limitation: Only mouse movement

(This is also my first public game made)

The Classic 'Asteroids', but with more! Have good old arcade-y fun sling grenades in space (and look good doing it)!

While this first version was made for the Mini Jam, I may add more content to the game. (PS excuse the bad name, I couldn't think of anything good :p)

BoIE (what shows up in when you start) is my "game studio", Box of Incriminating Evidence and is mostly just and inside joke, in case you were wondering.
